title: My custom prompt disappeared, how do I get it back?
content: Envtools comes with a few custom bash prompts (displaying some extra information like proxy, sinopia, git or node status). If you ran envtools auto, Envtools is installing its default prompt (the one displaying proxy and git status). You can change this by running envtools config and disable the option called Enable Envtools Custom Command Line Prompt.
